# opal Provider

Opal API: Your Home For Developer Resources.

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    opal = {
      source  = "opalsecurity/opal"
      version = "0.18.5"
    }
  }
}

provider "opal" {
  # Configuration options
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `bearer_auth` (String, Sensitive)
- `server_url` (String) Server URL (defaults to https://api.opal.dev/v1)
